metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25313 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5, an attacker can trigger stack exhaustion in build_model via a large nesting depth in the DTD element.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-25313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.4.1-2ubuntu0.3
libexpat1 - 2.4.1-2ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> paraview uses system expat xotcl uses system expat poco uses system expat gdcm uses system expat audacity uses system expat simgear uses system expat coin3 uses system expat as of 4.0.0~CMake~6f54f1602475+ds1-1 sitecopy uses system expat since 1:0.16.0-1 (dapper!) leosilva> from version 2.4.5-2 is known that fix for CVE-2022-25313 caused a regression so additional patches are needed. rodrigo-zaiden> libxmltok does not include build_model so, it is not affected.

criterions.comment: cadaver package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
expat package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.1-2ubuntu0.3').
firefox package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
